Title: TraceView Log Visualizer
Description:
TraceView s a log message viewer that uses a WPF client.
You can search and filter through your log messages with ease.
HomeWiki:
Description

This tool allows you to view log messages from different applications. The viewer provides for search and filtering abilities along with color coding of log messages based on categories like Error, Warning, Information etc... The main emphasis is on the ability to filter and categorize log messages. The tool also provides for pinning, copy, email and printing log messages.



Another key feature is the multi-user support, where you can view log messages from multiple users.
